name: School Flight Simulator
description:
Welcome aboard dear travelers. The plane takes off in 10 minutes, please fasten your seat belts!

The game School Flight Simulator is a simulation game that is predestined to fulfill the dreams of many of us who dreamed as small children to become a captain of an aircraft.

You will perform various exercises that involve improving your flying skills. Your mission is to fly from point A to point B safe and without losing all the fuel.
We want travelers to feel safe when they fly with you. It takes a lot of perseverance and effort to become a true professional, that’s why you are here with us.

Game features:
- 7 types of aircraft (Starting from the simplest planes to private jets)
- 18 levels
- Limited Fuel
